reviewText: We all know of kids who are hurting due to divorce and breakups.  They are living in our neighborhood.  There are a lot of materials available to help adults cope with divorce but the kids are caught in the middle and need this kind of help.  Jeffrey Natale has created a resource that relates to teens on their level.  From the opening music video teens will be glued to this movie.  The main character, Ari, is presented so well that I became emotional when she finally confronted her divorced parents.  Every Middle and High School should consider having this valuable resource available.
